summary: This is an email chain from October 2020 discussing news articles about Ghislaine Maxwell and a sexual assault case. The emails show coordination among individuals on 'the Maxwell team' regarding media coverage, with one person being looped into communications.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Subject of a New York Post article alleging she gagged and raped a woman; referred to as having a 'team' managing communications.

events.title: NY Post article on Maxwell allegation
events.description: New York Post publishes article with allegations that Ghislaine Maxwell gagged and raped a woman.

events.title: Washington Post article on sexual assault case
events.description: Washington Post publishes an article about a sexual assault case leading to a devastating allegation against a powerful man.

keyFacts: The email chain shows individuals coordinating on media related to Ghislaine Maxwell in October 2020.
One email mentions that a person (name redacted) 'is now on the Maxwell team' and should be looped into communications.
The emails reference two news articles: a Washington Post piece about a sexual assault case and a New York Post article alleging Maxwell gagged and raped a woman.
